sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 14:31  
tmortagne - (15:07): guys shouldn't the xwiki-core chart plugin be deprecated since we now have xwiki-core-chart-renderer component ?  
arkub left at 15:12 (Ping timeout: 240 seconds  
tmortagne - (15:18): i would like to simply remove the use of setDataAreaRatio to be able to use a proper version of jfreechart to fix XWIKI-4918  
tmortagne - (15:18): i can't find direct equivalent  
sdumitriu - (15:19): tmortagne: Ideally, yes  
sdumitriu - (15:20): The statistics still use the old chart  
sdumitriu - (15:20): I started refactoring the statistics app to the 2.0 syntax, I should finish it  
sdumitriu - (15:20): Another important aspect is that the new chart only support a few of the chart types the old plugin does  
sdumitriu - (15:21): And ever fewerr of its parameters for the supported chart types  
tmortagne - (15:23): sdumitriu: and do you know if setDataAreaRatio is that important ? or even better by working with jfreechart you seen something similar to it that i could use to replace it ?  
sdumitriu - (15:24): That is a really bugging issue  
sdumitriu - (15:24): It's years since we've been blocked by that method  
sdumitriu - (15:24): And I don't know what it does and what should be used instead  
tmortagne - (15:24): yep, having to use some old RC release of jfreechart just for this is not very nice...  
tmortagne - (15:25): it's like this feature has been simply removed as far as i can see  
tmortagne - (15:25): but i'm looking at jfreechart since only an hour and i never used it before

mflorea - (17:44): sdumitriu: how can I see the unminified rendered code of an JSX ?  
sdumitriu - (17:45): jsx.use('Doc.Name', {'minify'  
sdumitriu - (17:45): : false}

mflorea - (17:58): sdumitriu: how can I access the doc that includes the extension, $doc seems to be the doc holding the extension
